data.eml:eml: Archaeococcoid scale insects (Hemiptera: Coccoidea) from the tropical high mountains of the Andean Cordillera, South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Foldi, Imre (2009): Archaeococcoid scale insects (Hemiptera: Coccoidea) from the tropical high mountains of the Andean Cordillera, South America. Zootaxa 2300: 1-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191685
